text: Blackfire is a Native American punk rock group. == History == == Influences == Blackfire's influences include Green Day, The Clash, Aerosmith, Kiss, Nirvana, Lenny Kravitz, Soundgarden, Metallica, Poison, Mötley Crüe, Ramones, Black Flag, The Misfits, The Offspring, Social Distortion, Suicidal Tendencies, Bad Brains, Hüsker Dü, Meat Puppets, Goo Goo Dolls, Fishbone, Pennywise, Descendents, Buzzcocks, The Jam and INXS. == Band members == * Klee Benally - lead vocals, rhythm and lead guitar (1989-present) * Jeneda Benally - bass, backing vocals (1989-present) * Clayson Benally - drums, percussion, backing vocals (1989-present) == Discography == == References == == Other websites == * Blackfire: Official Website Category:Alternative rock bands Category:American punk bands Category:Musical groups established in 1989 Category:Musical groups from Arizona Category:Musicians from Phoenix, Arizona
title: Blackfire (American band)
